main: Well then Hero, anything you'd like to know?
branch_1: My name is Micah. I am a Devimancer. Someone who specializes in the manifestation and command of demonic entities. I can provide you these services if you need them, at a small cost ofcourse.
branch_2: Well, that's a question with a lot of answers. But this is the Grand Demonitorium of Yomotsu Hirasaka, seat of the Demon King. You're always welcome here.
branch_4: Try not to wind up dead, we really can't bring you back again.
